subject: Clutch Pedal
description_text:
Dear Simsoon Support Team,

I recently purchased the *Simsoon Plus X *(throttle and brake) and I’m very
satisfied with the product so far.

However, I would now like to expand my setup by adding a *clutch pedal*,
but I couldn’t find an option to purchase the clutch module *separately* –
neither on your website nor through third-party retailers.

Before considering the option of selling my current 2-pedal set (which I
bought at a good price), just to purchase the full 3-pedal version again, I
wanted to ask:

*Is it possible to purchase the clutch pedal separately* and integrate it
into my existing Simsoon Plus X setup?

If so:

   - What would the price be?
   - Is it available from an *EU warehouse* or only directly from you?
   - Would it come with any required cables or accessories?

Thank you in advance for your help, and keep up the great work – your pedal
set is truly impressive!

Best regards,
*Marcel Rosenberg*
------------------------------

conversations.body_text: Dear Marcel,  Thank you so much for your kind message and for your support of the Simsoon Plus X pedals – we’re really glad to hear you're enjoying them!  Regarding your request: We haven’t yet listed the new clutch pedal module for the Plus X series as a standalone product, but I will make it available for you tomorrow. The expected price will be $79 USD.  At the moment, our EU warehouse does not yet have stock of the new Plus X components, so the clutch pedal would be shipped directly from our main warehouse in China. Rest assured, all necessary cables and accessories will be included.  Thanks again for your great feedback – it truly means a lot to us!  Best regards, Simsoon Support Team

Hi, Simsoon Support Team

Thanks for confirming that the clutch pedal can be purchased separately.

I just wanted to check because I don’t have a shifter yet and can’t really
use the clutch properly right now. I’m just gathering info so I know what’s
possible for the future.

I’m not buying it now, but I’ll get back to you once I have all my
equipement ready, like the shifter and everything.

Appreciate your help!

Best Regards,

Marcel Rosenberg


service@simsonn.com
